amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to prohibit DoD from covering or furnishing gender-related medical treatment under TRICARE.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Department of Defense from covering or furnishing gender-related medical treatment under TRICARE.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 207 (Roll no. 246).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mace amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 207 (Roll no. 246).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
